duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle all financial aspects of the company and supervise staff as needed.
Perform budget-to-actual reporting and analysis on completed projects and those in process.
Forecast cash flow needs and report operational data to key members of the leadership team.
Complete a timely, accurate, and efficient accounting close on a monthly basis.
Manage the annual financial audit process conducted by an outside firm.
Develop, analyze, document, and implement internal controls.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or related field (Master's preferred)
